pricing.title: Simple and transparent
includes: 4 personalities to choose (Atlas, Nova, Spark, Sage)
Total privacy — data on your computer
Works with any AI (ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, local models)
pricing.api_note: HumanLink is the platform. The AI is on you — use your own API key. That way you control costs and choose the model you prefer.

items.question: Do I need to understand AI?
items.answer: No. If you know how to use a smartphone, you know how to use HumanLink.

items.question: What is an API key?
items.answer: It's like a password that connects HumanLink to the AI service you choose (ChatGPT, Claude, etc.). We explain everything step by step during installation.

items.question: Does it work offline?
items.answer: Whenever possible, yes. Memory, camera vision and computer control work without internet. For AI conversations, you need a connection (unless you use a local model).

items.question: Is it safe?
items.answer: HumanLink was designed with privacy first. Your data stays on your computer and never leaves your machine.

items.question: Can I change personality?
items.answer: Yes, anytime in settings. You can even try all 4 and see which one suits you best.

items.question: What computers does it work on?
items.answer: Windows 10+ and macOS 12+. Linux coming soon.

items.question: What is OpenClaw?
items.answer: It's the open-source engine that powers HumanLink. It's transparent technology, used by thousands of developers, that we packaged into a simple and beautiful experience for you.

items.question: How much does the AI itself cost?
items.answer: It depends on usage and the provider you choose. Most users spend between €2 and €10/month on AI. We help you optimize.
